class.name: JShape3D
class.description: Base class for 3D shapes that can be used with The Mirror Jolt's [JBody3D] node. This is the Jolt version of Godot's [Shape3D].

method.name: is_convex
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this shape is convex. All shapes are convex except for [JMeshShape3D] and any compound shapes containing [JMeshShape3D].

method.name: make_shape
method.description: Converts the data in this JShape3D resource to a Jolt shape resource.
